divs: Sighting Details i was parked at meriden markhaim airport7Bsmall7D taking pictures of the cometwhen i saw a plane in the west towards the moon.then i saw a disc hovering just over the moon off on the horizon. the planelooked like it was circlingunder the moon to the left of the object, as theplane aproched the objectthe object sped off towards the northwest. declining onthe horizon it looked to be breaking apart and burst into flames, then no trace.the plane flew offto the west and faded out of sight. i have six picturestotal, two of the comet and four of the object. at the time my camera was new tome and i was trying out the different settings. each of the pictures are fromthe differentsettings. but very clear. i also had a sighting in upper new yorkstate back in 1983. but little info on that encounter.
